categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Sleeping pad pump, dry sack, pillow, bucket – this is probably the most versatile stuff sack ever. The tough fabric is abrasion and tear resistant, so it carries water, works as a dry sack, or a backcountry shower.Lightweight Cordura nylon is abrasion, tear and scuff resistant.Watertight design hauls water without leaks.Nozzle end features a watertight valve for attaching to sleeping pad valves or for producing a backcountry shower.Compatible with the nozzle on Big Agnes Air Core Ultra, Insulated Air Core Ultra and Q Core SLX sleeping pads.Dimensions are 50 x 31cm tapering to 20cm at the bottom.
name: Big Agnes Pumphouse Ultra Pump
